div.p: This case-insensitive code system http://fhir.awmf.org/awmf.ig/CodeSystem/cs-care-setting defines the following codes:

tr.td: Activities aimed at preventing diseases or injuries before they occur.
The identification of diseases or conditions at an early stage, often before symptoms appear.
The process of determining the nature and cause of a disease or injury through evaluation of patient history, examination, and tests.
The treatment of a disease or condition, including medical, surgical, or psychological interventions.
The process of restoring physical, mental, or social abilities lost due to illness or injury.
First-contact healthcare provided by general practitioners or family physicians.
Healthcare provided by medical specialists with advanced training in specific fields.
Healthcare services provided to patients who are not admitted to a hospital or other facility.
Healthcare services provided to patients who are admitted to a hospital or other facility for at least one night.
Healthcare services provided in a hospital or facility during the day, with patients returning home at night.

description.value: CodeSystem defining different care settings, including levels of care, healthcare services, and treatment contexts.

definition.value: Activities aimed at preventing diseases or injuries before they occur.

valueString.value: Aktivitäten, die darauf abzielen, Krankheiten oder Verletzungen zu verhindern, bevor sie auftreten.

definition.value: The identification of diseases or conditions at an early stage, often before symptoms appear.

valueString.value: Erkennung von Krankheiten oder Zuständen in einem frühen Stadium, oft bevor Symptome auftreten.

definition.value: The process of determining the nature and cause of a disease or injury through evaluation of patient history, examination, and tests.

valueString.value: Prozess der Bestimmung der Art und Ursache einer Krankheit oder Verletzung durch Auswertung der Krankengeschichte, Untersuchungen und Tests.

definition.value: The treatment of a disease or condition, including medical, surgical, or psychological interventions.

valueString.value: Behandlung einer Krankheit oder eines Zustands, einschließlich medizinischer, chirurgischer oder psychologischer Eingriffe.

definition.value: The process of restoring physical, mental, or social abilities lost due to illness or injury.

valueString.value: Der Prozess der Wiederherstellung körperlicher, geistiger oder sozialer Fähigkeiten, die aufgrund von Krankheit oder Verletzung verloren gegangen sind.

definition.value: First-contact healthcare provided by general practitioners or family physicians.

valueString.value: Medizinische Versorgung durch den Allgemein- oder Hausarzt.

definition.value: Healthcare provided by medical specialists with advanced training in specific fields.

valueString.value: Medizinische Versorgung durch Fachärzt*innen mit spezieller Ausbildung in bestimmten Bereichen.

definition.value: Healthcare services provided to patients who are not admitted to a hospital or other facility.

valueString.value: Gesundheitsdienstleistungen für Patient*innen, die nicht in ein Krankenhaus oder eine andere Einrichtung eingewiesen werden.

definition.value: Healthcare services provided to patients who are admitted to a hospital or other facility for at least one night.

valueString.value: Gesundheitsdienstleistungen für Patient*innen, die für mindestens eine Nacht in ein Krankenhaus oder eine andere Einrichtung eingewiesen werden.

definition.value: Healthcare services provided in a hospital or facility during the day, with patients returning home at night.

valueString.value: Gesundheitsdienstleistungen, die tagsüber in einem Krankenhaus oder einer Einrichtung erbracht werden; Patient*innen bleiben nicht über Nacht im Krankenhaus oder in der Gesundheitseinrichtung.
